CustomField.formula:
'Billing Cycle: '& IF( FON_Billing_Type__c != null ,FON_Billing_Quarter__c, 'Net 30')& IF(FON_Billing_Quarter__c =='1Q','
'& FON_Billing_Type__c&' Billing Basis'& IF( FON_Billing_Type__c =='Deposit Based' , IF( Has_Prorate__c == true, ' – Prorated Annual Dues covered through '&'12/31/'& IF( FON_Invoice_Timing__c == 'Annual', TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))+1), TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))) ,'') &'
','')& IF(FON_Invoice_Timing__c == 'Annual', 'Annual Dues Coverage: 01/01/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))&' - 12/31/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))), 'Quarterly Dues Coverage: 01/01/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))&' - 03/31/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))) ) , IF(FON_Billing_Quarter__c =='2Q','
'& FON_Billing_Type__c&' Billing Basis'& IF( FON_Billing_Type__c =='Deposit Based' , IF( Has_Prorate__c == true, ' – Prorated Annual Dues covered through '&'3/31/'& IF( FON_Invoice_Timing__c == 'Annual', TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))+1), TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))) ,'') &'
','')& IF(FON_Invoice_Timing__c == 'Annual', 'Annual Dues Coverage: 04/01/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))&' - 03/31/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))+1), 'Quarterly Dues Coverage: 04/01/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))&' - 06/30/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))) ) , IF(FON_Billing_Quarter__c =='3Q','
'& FON_Billing_Type__c&' Billing Basis'& IF( FON_Billing_Type__c =='Deposit Based' , IF( Has_Prorate__c == true, ' – Prorated Annual Dues covered through '&'6/30/'& IF( FON_Invoice_Timing__c == 'Annual', TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))+1), TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))) ,'') &'
','')& IF(FON_Invoice_Timing__c == 'Annual', 'Annual Dues Coverage: 07/01/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))&' - 06/30/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))+1), 'Quarterly Dues Coverage: 07/01/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))&' - 09/30/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))) ) , IF(FON_Billing_Quarter__c =='4Q','
'& FON_Billing_Type__c&' Billing Basis'& IF( FON_Billing_Type__c =='Deposit Based' , IF( Has_Prorate__c == true, ' – Prorated Annual Dues covered through '&'9/30/'& IF( FON_Invoice_Timing__c == 'Annual', TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))+1), TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))) ,'') &'
','')& IF(FON_Invoice_Timing__c == 'Annual', 'Annual Dues Coverage: 10/01/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))&' - 09/30/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))+1), 'Quarterly Dues Coverage: 10/01/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW())))&' - 12/31/'&TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(NOW()))) ) , IF(FON_Billing_Quarter__c =='1QFull','
'& FON_Billing_Type__c&' Billing Basis – Annual Dues covered through '& IF( Sub_Quarter__c == '1Q', '1/1/'&FON_Invoice_Year__c&' to '&'12/31/', IF( Sub_Quarter__c == '2Q', '12/1/'&FON_Invoice_Year__c&' to '&'12/31/', IF( Sub_Quarter__c == '3Q', '3/1/'&FON_Invoice_Year__c&' to '&'12/31/', IF( Sub_Quarter__c == '1Q', '6/1/'&FON_Invoice_Year__c&' to '&'12/31/', '' ) ) ) )&FON_Invoice_Year__c , '' ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Sponsored Billing Coverage
